uiDefinition.description: The tenant ID of for the Microsoft Entra ID application

info.title: Office 365 Users
info.description: Office 365 Users Connection provider lets you access user profiles in your organization using your Office 365 account. You can perform various actions such as get your profile, a user's profile, a user's manager or direct reports and also update a user profile.

patch.description: Updates the profile of the current user

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the current user. Learn more about available fields to select: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/docs/api-reference/v1.0/resources/user#properties

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to select. Example: surname, department, jobTitle

put.description: Updates the profile photo of the current user. The size of the photo must be less than 4 MB.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Image content

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Image content type (like 'image/jpeg')

get.description: Retrieves the trending documents for the signed in user

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData filter to filter the resources selected. Filter selected resources on ResourceVisualization/Type or ResourceVisualization/containerType

parameters.name: extractSensitivityLabel
parameters.description: Select if you want to extract Sensitivity label ( false, true).

parameters.name: fetchSensitivityLabelMetadata
parameters.description: A boolean whether to fetch sensitivity label Metadata for associated LabelId.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the current user.
Retrieves the profile of a specific user.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the photo of the specified user if they have one.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the specified user's manager.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the user profiles of the specified user's direct reports.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the user profiles that match the search term.

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search string (applies to: display name, given name, surname, mail, mail nickname and user principal name).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Limit on the number of results to return. By default returns all entries.

get.description: Retrieves the user profiles that match the search term (V2).

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search string (applies to: display name, given name, surname, mail, mail nickname and user principal name).

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Limit on the number of results to return. Minimum value is 1. Default value is 1000.

parameters.name: isSearchTermRequired
parameters.description: If set to 'Yes' then no user profiles will be returned when the search term is empty. If set to 'No' then no filtering will be applied when the search term is empty.

parameters.name: skipToken
parameters.description: Skip token to get next users.

get.description: Retrieves the profile of a specific user. Learn more about available fields to select: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/docs/api-reference/v1.0/resources/user#properties

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to select. Example: surname, department, jobTitle

get.description: Retrieves the profile of the specified user's manager. Learn more about available fields to select: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/docs/api-reference/v1.0/resources/user#properties

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to select. Example: surname, department, jobTitle

get.description: Retrieves the user profiles of the specified user's direct reports. Learn more about available fields to select: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/docs/api-reference/v1.0/resources/user#properties

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to select. Example: surname, department, jobTitle

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Limit on the number of results to return. By default returns all entries.

get.description: Retrieves the photo of the specified user if they have one

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

get.description: Retrieves the trending documents for a user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User principal name or id.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData filter to filter the resources selected. Filter selected resources on ResourceVisualization/Type or ResourceVisualization/containerType

post.description: Construct a Microsoft Graph REST API request to invoke. These segments are supported: 1st segement: /me, /users/<userId> 2nd segment: messages, mailFolders, events, calendar, calendars, outlook, inferenceClassification. Learn more: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/use-the-api.

parameters.name: Uri
parameters.description: The full or relative URI. Example: https://graph.microsoft.com/{version}/{resource}.

parameters.name: Method
parameters.description: The HTTP method (default is GET).

parameters.name: Body
parameters.description: The request body content.

parameters.name: ContentType
parameters.description: The content-type header for the body (default is application/json).

parameters.name: CustomHeader1
parameters.description: Custom header 1. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader2
parameters.description: Custom header 2. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader3
parameters.description: Custom header 3. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader4
parameters.description: Custom header 4. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

parameters.name: CustomHeader5
parameters.description: Custom header 5. Specify in format: header-name: header-value

GraphUserUpdateable_V1.description: Updateable parts of user from Graph API

weight.description: Value indicating how much the document is currently trending

type.description: The item's media type (can be used for filtering for a specific file based on a specific type)

mediaType.description: The items media type (can be used for filtering for a specific type of file based on supported IANA Media MIME types)

previewImageUrl.description: A URL leading to the preview image for the item

previewText.description: A preview text for the item

containerWebUrl.description: A path leading to the folder in which the item is stored

containerDisplayName.description: A string describing where the item is stored

containerType.description: Can be used for filtering by the type of container in which the file is stored

color.x-ms-summary: color to be displayed for SensitivityLabel.
color.title: color

LinklessEntityListResponse[List[Person]].description: Represents a list from the Graph API

id.description: A unique identifier for the Person object in the directory

personNotes.description: Free-form notes that the current user has taken about this person

isFavorite.description: If the current user has flagged this person as a favorite

companyName.description: The name of the person's company

officeLocation.description: The location of the person's office

userPrincipalName.description: The user principal name(UPN) of the user.The UPN is an Internet-style login name for the user based on the Internet standard RFC 822. By convention, this should map to the user's email name.The general format is alias @domain, where domain must be present in the tenant's collection of verified domains.

scoredEmailAddresses.description: Collection of the person's email addresses with a relevance score

relevanceScore.description: The relevance score of the email address. A relevance score is used as a sort key, in relation to the other returned results. A higher relevance score value corresponds to a more relevant result. Relevance is determined by the user's communication and collaboration patterns and business relationships.

type.description: The type of phone number. Possible values: home, business, mobile, other, assistant, homeFax, businessFax, otherFax, pager, radio.

User.description: Represents a User object in the directory

Id.description: A unique identifier for the user object in the directory.

AccountEnabled.description: true if the account is enabled; otherwise, false. This property is required when a user is created.

BusinessPhones.description: A list of business phone numbers for the user

City.description: The city in which the user is located.

CompanyName.description: The name of the company in which the user works.

Country.description: The country/region in which the user is located; for example, "US" or "UK".

Department.description: The name of the department in which the user works.

DisplayName.description: The name displayed in the address book for the user. This is usually the combination of the user's first name, middle initial and last name. This property is required when a user is created and it cannot be cleared during updates.

GivenName.description: The given name (first name) of the user.

Mail.description: The SMTP/email address for the user, for example, "jeff@contoso.onmicrosoft.com". Read-Only.

MailNickname.description: The mail alias for the user. This property must be specified when a user is created.

mobilePhone.description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user.

OfficeLocation.description: The office location in the user's place of business.

PostalCode.description: The postal code for the user's postal address. The postal code is specific to the user's country/region. In the United States of America, this attribute contains the ZIP code.

Surname.description: The user's surname (family name or last name).

TelephoneNumber.description: The primary cellular telephone number for the user.

UserPrincipalName.description: The user principal name (UPN) of the user. The UPN is an Internet-style login name for the user based on the Internet standard RFC 822. By convention, this should map to the user’s email name. The general format is alias@domain, where domain must be present in the tenant’s collection of verified domains.

EntityListResponse[IReadOnlyList[User]].description: Class representing entity list response from an Office API.

accountEnabled.description: true if the account is enabled; otherwise, false. This property is required when a user is created.

city.description: The city in which the user is located.

companyName.description: The name of the company in which the user works.

country.description: The country/region in which the user is located; for example, "US" or "UK".

department.description: The name of the department in which the user works.

mailNickname.description: The mail alias for the user. This property must be specified when a user is created.

postalCode.description: The postal code for the user's postal address. The postal code is specific to the user's country/region. In the United States of America, this attribute contains the ZIP code.

extractSensitivityLabel.name: extractSensitivityLabel
extractSensitivityLabel.description: Select if you want to extract Sensitivity label ( false, true).

fetchSensitivityLabelMetadata.name: fetchSensitivityLabelMetadata
fetchSensitivityLabelMetadata.description: A boolean whether to fetch sensitivity label Metadata for associated LabelId.

properties.description: Office 365 Users Connection provider lets you access user profiles in your organization using your Office 365 account. You can perform various actions such as get your profile, a user's profile, a user's manager or direct reports and also update a user profile.

will: Read the full profile of all users
wont: Modify or delete any user-profile information
